archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.8b: b) providing targeted information security education/training that reflects the needs of individuals (e.g. using presentations, structured workshops, virtual environments, websites, videos and e-learning)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
